com.apple.audio.util
Class CAUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.apple.audio.util.CAUtils
public final class CAUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This provides a set of routines to convert between types that the CoreAudio calls expect and the basic Java classes and types

fromOSType

public static java.lang.String fromOSType(int osType)
Converts an int into a 4 character string representing an OSType. The OSType int is presumed to be the right endian layout.
